website_summaries.verdict: The ideal choice for buyers wanting an exceptionally built rope with extra length and fun accessories.
pros: Polyester fiber ensures the rope will last for years to come
50' length is perfect for gatherings and large parties
Includes a Tug-of-War flag and a convenient carrying case
cons: The blue ends can wear down after heavy use
A few buyers had issues with durability

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality!  Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these so we could try it out and see what kind of quality it was. I was so impressed, I ordered three more! Very good quality. Especially for the price. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Rope!
customer_reviews.text: Our church used this for our VBS. It was fun to watch and they had a blast! It was nice to have the middle of the rope marked and an extra rope to put down on the ground with stakes to show who wins. The only thing I would mention is to tape the blue things on the end of the rope. They came off easy after a few times of tug of war. All around a great rope and it comes in a nice storage bag too!
customer_reviews.author: beks

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the length of the rope; however, the blue tape at the end of the rope came off and the rope started to unravel.. We only used it once at a community picnic. I was very disappointed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: AvoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Much shorter than described. Disappointing quality.
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this, description was for a 50’ rope. The one I got was only 33’. Disappointing. Also, the plastic ends pulled off very easily. The rope was wound loose and sheds a lot of fibers, which is also not good. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to find a good quality tug of war rope. This is it!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why people were complaining about this hurting their hands? It’s a regular tug of war rope. Made just like any other one you’d use. Was a hit at our picnic. Adults and children used it. Everyone seemed fine after playing a handful of times. No rope burn. It’s the perfect length. We e had others borrow it from us since then.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Younes

customer_reviews.title: Nice rope, nice storage bag, horrible end-cap covers.
customer_reviews.text: As many other reported, the end caps are crap and fell off just as I was taking the rope out of the bag. Just make your own with fitted leather sewn on while wet and let it dry, or just knot it to make handles of sort. It's soft enough that that will be good enough. Otherwise, good stuff and the bag is really a nice touch
customer_reviews.author: Ceinan

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Terrible didn’t last an hour before it unraveled and fell apart!
customer_reviews.author: Cherell Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Ouch! Rug Burns!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Day Camp to use in the summer, EVERYONE got rope burns and had to visit the nurse. Disappointed because I had a rope that did the same thing already and thought I was upgrading. Would not recommend for adults or kids.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic rope but it is soft enough for young kids. Plenty of length and hefty-fun! Good value item, recommended for once in a while youth wars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ends of rope need more glue
customer_reviews.text: This was everyone's favorite game at the kids birthday party. Just need to be a little more glued on the ends. One of the ends slipped off on the first round
customer_reviews.author: yessejames

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 'ouchless' Tuh-O-War Games
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product! We played several games with this rope with adults, teens and small kiddos. Easy on the hands and NO splinters
customer_reviews.author: Misty Mcfadden

customer_reviews.title: Great rope for tug o war!
customer_reviews.text: Great rope. Kids loved the tug of war. Held up very well and will be used for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Chalky cole

customer_reviews.title: Great tug of war
customer_reviews.text: Great for tug of war. Very good length for a big group of kids. I found it to be very sturdy. Comes with a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: Applebee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great and sturdy for the money can't wait to try it out this 4th of July Holiday
customer_reviews.author: Kneecie

customer_reviews.title: Great for family reunion!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a family reunion and it held up great with about 7-8 people on each side. Perfect for reunion games. I’d buy again if I needed to but this looks like it will last a long time. Also rope doesn’t hurt on hands.
customer_reviews.author: J_Lopez89

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our family reunion. The kids loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Sarazin

customer_reviews.title: Serves it purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this rope to use during a work function family day. It served it’s purpose. The grips at the ends of the rope came off right after the first game. Also, the flag that should’ve been located at the middle of the rope was missing. I replaced it with a bandana. Like I said... it served it’s purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He is now even more obsessed with this rope and they great carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my cousin who has Down Syndrome. He is obsessed with tug of war. He is now even more obsessed with this rope and they great carrying case! He takes it everywhere...literally! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Estelle

customer_reviews.title: The carrying case and rope material is great! The blue ends where off from the rope
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case and rope material is great! The blue ends where off from the rope, so I used electrical tape and it worked perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: 1800-Time-Clocks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor activities.
customer_reviews.text: This rope is great for kids all ages. Nice and sturdy. Does have a strong smell when you first use it.
customer_reviews.author: Bre Brown

customer_reviews.title: Best Rope Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this rope for our family reunion and it helped make our “Family Field Day” a success!!
customer_reviews.author: Kamika A. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Short-Changed.
customer_reviews.text: I just unpacked this rope - opened it to find it was VERY SHORT. Measured it....it was exactly 35’ long - 15’ short. Too short to use it for the event it was bought for.
customer_reviews.author: Kamikaze

customer_reviews.title: Tough tug a war rope
customer_reviews.text: My family and I really enjoyed this tug of war rope at the family reunion. We are looking for more games to play or introduce our kiddos to. Thanks for such a tough product.
customer_reviews.author: Narva B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tug of war for kids to adults
customer_reviews.text: Big tough rope, worked great for tug of war from young kids to adults.
customer_reviews.author: Jay P.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Loved the rope and it was a blast for the kids and parents to use
customer_reviews.author: shalece jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Great durable rope material, can use again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great texture and color! Great for tying off my boat. 👏🏾
customer_reviews.author: Hack t. Culling

customer_reviews.title: Rope unraveled after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, however the rope edge unraveled after two uses. So that required quite a bit of fixing.
customer_reviews.author: Nursif

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: We used the rope at our family reunion. It was lots of fun. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Wrope held up good but dials and other attachments broke. can't use it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for adults and kids alike!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product that we used for our neighborhood field day, including adults. Its great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie I.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect rope
customer_reviews.text: The rope was perfect for tug-of-war excellent quality and the shipping was incredible fast and not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jlnieltz

customer_reviews.title: Nice Rope and Carrying Bag.  Great Length.
customer_reviews.text: When my 200 lb assistant decided to help the grade schoolers being tugged across the floor I knew this rope was going to be fun! Arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Homewood Mom

customer_reviews.title: Unraveling
customer_reviews.text: Had not even been used 5 times and one end started to unravel. Less than an hour
customer_reviews.author: Tammy McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our work field day activities
customer_reviews.text: item as described and shipped fast. Perfect for our work field day activities.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Gherardini

customer_reviews.title: Rope not actual size
customer_reviews.text: The rope is 35 ft. Not 50ft. And looked dirty and used
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Rope is coming apart at the ends. Unable to use after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item but it did have a very strong odor of oil
customer_reviews.author: Stacy veal

customer_reviews.title: Only 33 feet long.
customer_reviews.text: The rope is fine, but it's exactly 33 get long, not 50. I'm using this for a large outdoor party, so its length was important and I specifically looked for something at least 50 feet long.
customer_reviews.author: TKOS

customer_reviews.title: Went over well with young Boy Scouts.
customer_reviews.text: This tug-of-war rope went over well with our Boy Scout troop. One of the first things that one of the boys did was to feel the rope, and after they felt that it was not rough, or scratchy, he joined in. The carry case/bag is really nice to have, and the extra things like the flag, taped ends of the rope, and stakes to mark the boundary were an added bonus. I'd get this again just for the rope itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kaman

product_meta.title: EASYGO 33 Foot TUG of WAR Rope with Flag – Kids and Adults Family Game – Team Building – Soft Rope - Professional Long Lasting - Extra Thick for Easier GRIPPING
feature_bullets: LAWN GAME FUN – Great family game or use for parties, camps, community fairs, or just to have fun! Our tug of war flag is in the middle of the rope dividing your team from the other side. If your team can pull the other team across the center line, you WIN!
TEAM BUILDING – Have fun through cooperation and deluxe team building with this tug of war rope adults will love as much as the kids!
STRONG AND STURDY – Made of polyester fiber, this rope is durable and long lasting. It can outlast the tugging and pulling for many tug of war games!

EASY ON THE HANDS – Our rope kids and adults alike can use without it hurting your hands or having it splinter in your hands. This rope is soft and just the right diameter for small and large hands to pull your team to victory!

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED - We are so confident that you will like our TUG OF WAR ROPE that if you return it within 30 days for any reason we will give you a full refund on the product price. Try it we know you will like it!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars175 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
